  Log files are located at `~/tf2autobot/logs`. There are three log files:
  * <STEAM_ACCOUNT_NAME>-<DATE>.log - Default log file (excluding error and trade log levels)
  * <STEAM_ACCOUNT_NAME>.error.log - Error log
